about_the_game: There will be blood on the dance floor with Typing of the Dead: Overkill’s latest DLC - ‘Dancing with the Dead’. This DLC pack replaces all the words and phrases in the game with song lyrics, famous artists, and various musical instruments and terms.
detailed_description: There will be blood on the dance floor with Typing of the Dead: Overkill’s latest DLC - ‘Dancing with the Dead’. This DLC pack replaces all the words and phrases in the game with song lyrics, famous artists, and various musical instruments and terms.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6450, NVIDIA GeForce GT 220 or Intel Integrated Graphics HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
